name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Casanis)
description:
Solo Jam Game...Theme:  Death is not the End

10 player multiplayer game.  Best played with 4 or more.

First into the sever will be the zombie player in the game.

Zombie player must left click on human players to turn humans into zombies.  Turn all the human players to zombies to win the game.

Human players must stand on the generators to turn on the lights.  Zombies move slowly through lit areas.  Turn on 6 lights to win the game.

Let me know what you think...this was my first multiplayer game.
